import styles from './Profile.module.css'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; export default function Profile({ username, tag, location, avatar, stats }) { return (

{username}

@{tag}

{location}

  • Followers

    {stats.followers}

  • Views

    {stats.views}

  • Likes

    {stats.likes}

); } Profile.propTypes = { username: PropTypes.string.isRequired, tag: PropTypes.string.isRequired, location: PropTypes.string.isRequired, avtar: PropTypes.string.isRequired, stats: PropTypes.sha(PropTypes.number), };
